title: OSGeo Statement: EU Cyber Resilience Act
content: The Cyber Resilience Act will, by design, place considerable strain on the Open Source Geospatial Foundation and the service providers who power so much of our ecosystem. The OSGeo community has been active during this process lending their voice of concern, feedback, and moral objection (not everything is a product!) and support. We encourage you to get informed and lend your voice of support to ensure that these laws do not jeopardise or impact projects like QGIS. Double-click this entry to learn more.
